contest-event.event-date: April 24, 1976 D Midlands Area (Second Section) Midlands Area (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-second-section National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Second Tournament for Brass De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK 13 bands competed.
